title: Protocol - Elements For Good Living
description: Since opening in 2002, Protocol has sought to provide Wilmington and the surrounding area with a source for fine gifts, tableware and decorative accessories - all in an atmosphere of superior customer service.
cleaned_text: Elements For Good Living A curated selection of gifts, decorative accessories and distinctive furnishings for the home. [Shop Our Collections](/collections) Featured Products At Protocol, we hand pick brands made of the finest materials; that exemplify superb craftsmanship and attention to detail. Our Story Since opening in 2002, Protocol has become one of North Carolina's largest and most recognizable retail stores. With more than 100 hand-selected fine home furnishing products, gifts and accessories in the industry, Protocol stands with you for all special occasions, as you turn your house into a home and your home into a haven. [About Us](/pages/about-us) Protocol 3502 Wrightsville Ave, 5:00pm Saturday: 10:00 am-3:00 pm Sunday: Closed
